name: Definitely...a great film
reviewBody: I think that it is a great film. The actors have made a great interpretation because they transmit emotion to the spectator. The landscape also is perfect and the base of the film treats a subject that nowadays it even gives of what to speak. A magnificent film if you are interested on the culture and the great person who had been Che Guevara. In addition, the actions are based on a real story. I saw it in Spanish, its original language, and I think that it's better, because seeing the film in another language it loses some of its essence. I think too many people doesn't know in what conditions live the people of South America and we can know it with this film. It is also a pity and an injustice that the producers of Hollywood have not wanted to promote the film too much, although it has received numerous positive critics. Sorry for my bad English!!
